name: Singleton Pattern
description: Implement a singleton counter simulation. Given a sequence of operations ['get', 'increment', 'get', 'reset', 'get'], simulate a singleton that maintains a single counter instance. 'get' returns current value, 'increment' adds 1, 'reset' sets to 0. Return the sum of all 'get' results.
hints: The singleton pattern ensures only one instance exists. Use a class variable or closure to maintain state across all operations.
